job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Machine Learning Engineer / Remote </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Do want to be part one of the most innovative Machine Learning teams at an internationally leading technology company?</p><p><br></p><p>Yes? Read on. . .</p><p><br></p><p>This enterprise generates over 6 billion Euros annually and operates in niche areas within Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and Optical Technology.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>In this role, you'll work alongside the best. Driving the algorithmic development of cutting edge digital products, in a diverse team of scientists and researchers. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>You'll also have freedom to design new visions and prototypes for a varied consumer products roadmap. </p><p><br></p><p>To be a good fit, you’ll need:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Extensive experience with applied machine leaning research, preferably computational imaging.</li><li>Proficiency in Python TensorFlow, and PyTorch.</li><li>A great knowledge of image/video processing (Neural style transfer. Image fusion) </li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p>This is great opportunity to work in a highly collaborative environment,&nbsp;In a spacious modern setting, with lots of opportunities for further development.</p>
